use.flag: Pull in virtual/krb5 if using USE=abi_x86_32. Disabling it is unsupported, use on your own responsibility. Irrelevant when using USE=-abi_x86_32.
Pull in net-nds/openldap if using USE=abi_x86_32. Disabling it is unsupported, use on your own responsibility. Irrelevant when using USE=-abi_x86_32.
Pull in virtual/pam if using USE=abi_x86_32. Disabling it is unsupported, use on your own responsibility. Irrelevant when using USE=-abi_x86_32.
